languages.text: {n}Ульфар пожимает плечами.{/n} "Пойду, куда глаза глядят, и буду спрашивать всякого встречного: "Ведаешь ли ты лик зла?" А потом буду находить и убивать это зло. И так, пока не найдется тот, кто прикончит меня. Если захочешь отыскать меня — иди по кровавому следу на снегу. А если найдешь в конце его мое остывшее тело... Сделай милость, похорони с честью, эттфатер".

{n}Ulfar shrugs.{/n} "I will go wherever and ask every person I meet, 'Do you know the face of evil?' Then I will find that evil and kill it. Until I find someone who kills me. If you want to seek me out, follow the bloody trail in the snow. And should you find my cold body at the end, do me a favour and give me a proper burial, Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар пожимает плечами.{/n} "Пойду, куда глаза глядят, и буду спрашивать всякого встречного: "Ведаешь ли ты лик зла?" А потом буду находить и убивать это зло. И так, пока не найдется тот, кто прикончит меня. Если захочешь отыскать меня — иди по кровавому следу на снегу. А если найдешь в конце его мое остывшее тело... Сделай милость, похорони с честью, эттфатер".

If you want to seek me out, follow the blood trail in the snow. And should you find my cold body at the end, do me a favour and give me a proper burial, Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法耸了耸肩。{/n}“无论我走到哪里，我都会问我遇到的每个人，‘你见过任何邪恶之人吗？’如果他们说见过，我就会找到那个恶人，杀了他，直到我在这场狩猎中丧命为止。如果你想来找我，就沿着雪地上的血迹来找吧。如果你最后发现了我冰冷的尸体，请帮我个忙，给我个体面的葬礼，狼领。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shrugs.{/n} "I will go wherever and ask every person I meet, 'Do you know the face of evil?' Then I will find that evil and kill it. Until I find someone who kills me. If you want to seek me out, follow the bloody trail in the snow. And should you find my cold body at the end, do me a favour and give me a proper burial, Aett-Vater."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Iré adonde me plazca y preguntaré a todo el que encuentre "¿Conoces el rostro del mal?". Y encontraré ese mal y lo mataré, hasta que encuentre a alguien que me mate a mí. Si quiere encontrarme, solo tiene que seguir el rastro de sangre sobre la nieve. Y, si lo que encuentra al final del camino es mi cuerpo helado, hágame un favor y entiérreme como es debido, Aett-Vater».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shrugs.{/n} "I will go wherever and ask every person I meet, 'Do you know the face of evil?' Then I will find that evil and kill it. Until I find someone who kills me. If you want to seek me out, follow the bloody trail in the snow. And should you find my cold body at the end, do me a favour and give me a proper burial, Aett-Vater."

Y encontraré ese mal y lo mataré, hasta que encuentre a alguien que me mate a mí. Si quiere encontrarme, solo tiene que seguir el rastro de sangre sobre la nieve. Y, si lo que encuentra al final del camino es mi cuerpo helado, hágame un favor y entiérreme como es debido, Aett-Vater».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは肩をすくめる。{/n}「俺は行く先々で、会う奴らに '悪い奴を知っているか 'と尋ねるんだ。そしてその悪者を見つけて殺す。それは、俺を殺す者が出てくるまで続くんだ。俺を探したければ、雪の中で血の跡をたどればいいぞ。アエット＝ヴァテルよ、最後の最後に、冷たくなった俺の死体を見つけたら、ちゃんと埋めておくれ、頼んだぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shrugs.{/n} "I will go wherever and ask every person I meet, 'Do you know the face of evil?' Then I will find that evil and kill it. Until I find someone who kills me. If you want to seek me out, follow the bloody trail in the snow. And should you find my cold body at the end, do me a favour and give me a proper burial, Aett-Vater."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich wandere umher und frage jeden, den ich begegne: 'Kennt Ihr das Gesicht des Bösen?' Dann finde ich dieses Böse und töte es. Bis ich jemanden finde, der mich tötet. Wenn Ihr mich suchen wollt, folgt der Blutspur im Schnee. Und solltet Ihr an deren Ende meine kalte Leiche finden, tut mir einen Gefallen und bestattet mich ordentlich, Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shrugs.{/n} "I will go wherever and ask every person I meet, 'Do you know the face of evil?' Then I will find that evil and kill it. Until I find someone who kills me. If you want to seek me out, follow the bloody trail in the snow. And should you find my cold body at the end, do me a favour and give me a proper burial, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich wandere umher und frage jeden, den ich begegne: 'Kennt Ihr das Gesicht des Bösen?' Dann finde ich dieses Böse und töte es. Bis ich jemanden finde, der mich tötet. Wenn Ihr mich suchen wollt, folgt der Blutspur im Schnee. Und solltet Ihr an deren Ende meine kalte Leiche finden, tut mir einen Gefallen und bestattet mich ordentlich, Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar hausse les épaules.{/n} « Je parcourrai le monde et je demanderai à tous ceux qui croiseront ma route s'ils ont déjà vu le mal en face. Ensuite, j'irai trouver ce mal et je le tuerai, jusqu'au jour où je succomberai à mon tour. Si vous me cherchez, suivez la traînée de sang dans la neige. Et si, au bout du chemin, vous découvrez mon corps sans vie, rendez-moi service et accordez-moi des funérailles dignes de ce nom, aett-vater. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shrugs.{/n} "I will go wherever and ask every person I meet, 'Do you know the face of evil?' Then I will find that evil and kill it. Until I find someone who kills me. If you want to seek me out, follow the bloody trail in the snow. And should you find my cold body at the end, do me a favour and give me a proper burial, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar hausse les épaules.{/n} « Je parcourrai le monde et je demanderai à tous ceux qui croiseront ma route s'ils ont déjà vu le mal en face. Ensuite, j'irai trouver ce mal et je le tuerai, jusqu'au jour où je succomberai à mon tour. Si vous me cherchez, suivez la traînée de sang dans la neige. Et si, au bout du chemin, vous découvrez mon corps sans vie, rendez-moi service et accordez-moi des funérailles dignes de ce nom, aett-vater. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Her yere gideceğim ve karşılaştığım herkese soracağım: 'Kötülüğün suretini biliyor musun?' Ardından o kötülüğü bulacağım ve öldüreceğim. Beni öldürecek birini bulana kadar. Beni araman gerekirse kardaki kan izlerini takip et. O izlerin sonunda benim soğumuş cesedimi bulur isen de bana bir iyilik yap ve benim için usulüne uygun bir cenaze düzenle Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar shrugs.{/n} "I will go wherever and ask every person I meet, 'Do you know the face of evil?' Then I will find that evil and kill it. Until I find someone who kills me. If you want to seek me out, follow the bloody trail in the snow. And should you find my cold body at the end, do me a favour and give me a proper burial, Aett-Vater."
